page.title: 19BARRETTS OF FECKENHAM
page.content:
T he largest store in the block is Barretts of Feckenham. It is situated just outside the village of Feckenham.
It began as a Saddlers shop in approximately 1830, and has operated as a retail business in the same location ever since. In recent years it has expanded considerably and is now one of Britains leading leisure groups within its own range of merchandise.
In the 1960's the old double fronted cottages were demolished and the present building was erected. The anoraks and casual clothing lines were developed and added to the already established lines of saddlery and sheepskin clothing. The camping and outdoor leisure furniture sections also expanded at this time.
